document.docAuthor: Almeida, Thaís Melo de, Stefanello, Fabiano & Hamada, Neusa
document.masterDocTitle: Belostomatidae (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha) held in the Invertebrate Collection of the Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas da Amazônia, Manaus, Brazil: inventory and new distributional records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Belostomatidae (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha) held in the Invertebrate Collection of the Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas da Amazônia, Manaus, Brazil: inventory and new distributional records

subSubSection.paragraph:
Known distribution: ARGENTINA :
Chaco ( De Carlo, 1938 ), Corrientes ( Montandon, 1903b ), Entre Rios ( De Carlo, 1930 ), Santa Fé ( Lauck, 1963 ).
BOLIVIA :
Beni ( Lauck, 1963 ), Reyes ( Lauck, 1963 ).
BRAZIL :
Acre ( Ribeiro, 2005 ), Amazonas ( De Carlo, 1938 ), Goiás ( Menke & Lauck, 1962 ), Mato Grosso ( De Carlo, 1930 ), Mato Grosso do Sul ( Ribeiro, 2005 ), Pará ( Nieser, 1975 ), Rio de Janeiro ( Ribeiro, 2005 ), Rondônia ( Ribeiro, 2005 ), São Paulo ( Ribeiro, 2007 ), Tocantins (
Ribeiro et al., 2018
).
PARAGUAY :
unknow Departament ( Montandon, 1903b ).
PERU :
Amazonas ( Lauck, 1963 ), Junín ( Lauck, 1963 ), Loreto ( Lauck, 1963 ), Marcapata ( Ribeiro, 2007 ), Pucallpa ( Lauck, 1963 ), Trapiche river ( Lauck, 1963 ), Ucayali river ( Lauck, 1963 ).
